Description.p: As Practice Manager of Avalon Consulting, LLC's National Search Practice, Mr. Green is responsible for managing the daily operations for a team of consultants as well as for driving new business within the practice. With over 20 years of experience in the IT industry, he works closely with Avalon's strategic partners, leading technology providers in the Enterprise Search space, to drive new business for Avalon. Once engaged, Mr. Green manages the account relationships to ensure successful delivery and client satisfaction.

As a Principal Consultant within EDS' Applications Transformation Team, Mr. Green worked to help clients derive strategic IT transformation with a specific focus on applications modernization and agile application strategies.

In this role, he led engagements to define IT transformation strategies for multiple public and private enterprises in various industries including Health Care, Transportation, Manufacturing and Financial Services. This includes the creation of transformational modernization strategies for Kaiser Permanente, Blue Cross Blue Shield of Massachusetts, Express Scripts, Delta Dental, US Airways, and Grupo Nacional Provencial (Mexico's largest insurance company). During these engagements, Mr. Green worked with the IT / Business leaders to understand the current business processes and technical environment and to define a roadmap and business plan to modernize and transform their IT organization and strategy.

This 2-person-year effort was delivered on time, on budget, and exceeded quality expectations. The resulting platform increased flexibility to deliver custom features for clients and resulted in a reduction in the time to onboard new clients by fifty percent.

Mr. Green managed the integration of an identity management solution with the online store-front for a Fortune 500 retailer. He was responsible for the development of the technical proposal and architecture of the solution, and also managed the delivery of the project. The solution required expertise in web application development and user experience. The project required coordination of client resources, internal resources and contract labor to deliver within an aggressive timeframe. The result expanded access to the store-front to a new user base by increasing the ease of checkout for several million potential users.
